body:
Hey, I'm on my iphone right now. Yesterday I made a post called "Woah..." I accidentally put it on the "avicus lounge" category. Just now, I went on my phone to go check on it and it wasn't here. Is it just my mobile phone, did somebody archive it or what? If somebody archived it please tell me why.



Cheers! :D
26763

title: Archived or what?

replies.body: It was probably archieved because it was spammy/a flame war started. Most likely it was spammy like this topic.

It's probably a glitch; as it's happened before...
